name: RetroBot
description: RetroBot is an oscilloscope-themed robot with a nostalgic touch. Its retro console design and classic buttons give it a unique charm. With arms and legs made from durable foundry materials, RetroBot is built to withstand the test of time. Although its screen may be broken, it still functions perfectly as an oscilloscope, providing accurate measurements and waveforms. To add to its cool style, RetroBot is equipped with a pair of stylish shades. This robot is a proud member of the WebtrES club, where it embraces its vintage appeal and contributes to the advancement of technology.
